channel.title: Comments on: The N-Word
channel.description: See Berlin through a lens of migration and difference

item.title: By: parisberlindc
item.dc:creator: parisberlindc
item.description: This all too serious topic is often, unfortunately, distorted and used to gain political points. Thank you for a commentary that is at once impartial, informed and heartfelt. We need more of those. Keep up the good work.
item.content:encoded:
This all too serious topic is often, unfortunately, distorted and used to gain political points.
Thank you for a commentary that is at once impartial, informed and heartfelt. We need more of those. Keep up the good work.
